Package org.udem.unishop.services

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.services.OrderService
public class OrderService extends Object
Service class for handling order-related operations.

    • OrderService

      public OrderService(UserService userService, ProductService productService)
      Constructor for OrderService class.
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service to interact with user-related operations.
      productService - The product service to interact with product-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public List<UUID> createOrder(Buyer currentUser, boolean usePoints)
      Creates orders for the products included in the buyer's cart. Handles various aspects such as updating user points, removing instances, and creating orders with associated products.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The buyer for whom the orders are being created.
      usePoints - A boolean indicating whether to use loyalty points for the order.
      Returns:
      A list of unique order IDs generated during the process.

    • modifyOrderStatus

      public void modifyOrderStatus(Order order, User currentUser)
      Modifies the status of an order based on the role of the current user.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be modified.
      currentUser - The user initiating the status update.

    • reportProblem

      public void reportProblem(Order order, List<String> inputs)
      Reports a problem related to an order, creating and associating an issue object with the order.
      Parameters:
      order - The reported order.
      inputs - A list of information about the issue.

    • confirmDelivery

      public void confirmDelivery(Order order)
      Confirms the successful delivery of an order and updates the order status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order for which the delivery is confirmed.

    • confirmIssueDelivery

      public void confirmIssueDelivery(Order order)
      Confirms the resolution of an issue related to delivery and updates the issue status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order associated with the resolved delivery issue.

    • confirmIssueReturn

      public void confirmIssueReturn(Order order)
      Confirms the initiation of a return process for an order and updates the issue status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order associated with the return process.

    • offerSolution

      public void offerSolution(Order order, String s)
      Offers a solution to a reported issue on an order and updates the issue status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order associated with the reported issue.
      s - The offered solution to the reported issue.

    • acceptSolution

      public void acceptSolution(Order order)
      Accepts the proposed solution to a reported issue on an order and updating the issue status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order associated with the reported issue.

    • cancelIssueReturn

      public void cancelIssueReturn(Order order)
      Cancels the return process for an order's reported issue and updates the issue status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order associated with the reported issue.

    • createReturnOrder

      public void createReturnOrder(Order order)
      Creates the return process for an order and updates order status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order for which the return process is initiated.

    • returnOrder

      public void returnOrder(Order order, HashMap<UUID,List<UUID>> returnItems)
      Processes the return of specific items from an order and updates the order status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order for which the return is processed.
      returnItems - A mapping of product IDs to lists of instances representing the items being returned.

    • exchangeOrder

      public void exchangeOrder(Order order, HashMap<UUID,List<UUID>> exchangeItems, HashMap<UUID,List<UUID>> returnItems)
      Processes the exchange of items in an order and updates order status.
      Parameters:
      order - The order for which the exchange is processed.
      exchangeItems - A mapping of product IDs to lists of instances representing the items being exchanged.
      returnItems - A mapping of product IDs to lists of instances representing the items being returned.

    • getOrderById

      public Order getOrderById(UUID buyerId, UUID orderId)
      Retrieves an order by its ID for a specific buyer.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The ID of the buyer for whom the order is retrieved.
      orderId - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The order with the specified ID for the given buyer, or null if not found.
